title: Take a Dinner Cruise at Sunset Along Waikiki’s Iconic Shoreline
text: Experience the enchanting allure of stunning dinner cruises Oahu at sunset along the picturesque Waikiki shoreline. This exceptional cruise seamlessly blends breathtaking sightseeing, delectable cuisine, and captivating local entertainment, offering an unparalleled experience for all visitors. Often likened to a “floating lū’au,” this extraordinary cruise features a sumptuous buffet-style meal complemented by the mesmerizing performances of traditional Polynesian dancers and other entertainers, ensuring an evening at sea that is truly unforgettable. Departure Points and Scenic Routes Most dinner cruises in Oahu depart from the iconic Aloha Tower at Honolulu Harbor. The luxurious ships leisurely cruise along the stunning skylines of downtown Honolulu and Waikiki, providing breathtaking views of the cityscape and the pristine coastline. As the golden orb of the sun begins its descent, the dinner cruises in Waikiki Oahu carefully anchors near the awe-inspiring Diamond Head Crater, offering passengers a breathtaking view of the magnificent sunset over the vast expanse of the Pacific Ocean. The glowing hues of the sky gradually shift from radiant pinks and oranges to deep purples and blues, creating a mesmerizing spectacle of nature’s grandeur.During the winter months, there’s an added delight as passengers have the opportunity to observe the magnificent Hawaiian humpback whales making their annual migration from Alaska to the warm and shallow waters of Hawaii to give birth and find mates. Your Two Choices of Full-Service Dinner Cruises| Dinner cruises in Honolulu Hawaii Now, there are only two options for full-service Oahu dinner cruises, the Star of Honolulu and the Majestic. Both offer unrivaled experiences while delivering and picking up at all hotels. The Star of Honolulu The Star of Honolulu is a magnificent 232-foot-long ship with a vast deck and the ability to accommodate 1,500 passengers, establishing its status as the largest tour vessel in Hawaii. The vessel offers a variety of Honolulu Cruise dinner packages suitable for all tastes and budgets. One of the most luxurious options is the five-star dining experience, where guests can enjoy a seven-course gourmet meal on the top deck in an elegant and intimate fine dining atmosphere. The cost for this experience is $199 per person. For those looking for a family-friendly option, the Pacific Star Sunset Buffet & Show is ideal. This package includes a buffet dinner and a captivating show, making it perfect for entertaining families with children. The price for adults is $89, and children can enjoy the experience for $54. Tables accommodate six to eight guests, and guests can opt for window table reservations by paying an additional $30. Residents of Hawaii, or kama’āina, can enjoy a 19% discount on each package. Additionally, the Star of Honolulu offers special rates for its popular Friday night firework dinner cruises. The dinner packages closest to the front of the ship, which are also the highest in price, offer the most intimate dining experiences with higher quality food and drinks. Guests can savor tender and juicy steaks and perfectly cooked plump lobster. The Honolulu boat cruise also provides full bar service, and the cruise through the ocean waves is both smooth and enjoyable. The Maj Experience a truly mesmerizing journey aboard the lavish Majestic vessel. This impressive 150-foot long ship boasts three decks and large windows, providing unparalleled views from every table for up to 400 guests. Launched in May 2016, the Majestic promises a luxurious and serene dining experience, setting it apart from the entertainment-focused atmosphere of the Star of Honolulu. Indulge in a dinner cruise departing at 5:30 pm, with prices starting at $117.40 for adults and $60 for children. If you’re a local, take advantage of the kama’āina rates, which offer tickets at $82.17 for adults and $42 for children. Notably, the Majestic hosts special Friday night dinner cruises featuring breathtaking fireworks, adding an extra touch of magic to your evening. A More Casual Dinner Cruise Experience If you’re looking for a leisurely and comfortable dining experience at sea, consider the Makani Catamaran. This 65-person capacity catamaran yacht departs from the Kewalo Basin and offers a more laid-back dinner cruise without live entertainment. During the two-hour cruise, guests can enjoy background music and have the option to dine inside the cabin or outdoors on the deck. The adult tickets are priced at $75.69, and kama’āina can avail tickets at a discounted rate of $65.69. Moreover, the Makani Catamaran provides round-trip transportation from your hotel for added convenience. If you’re sailing aboard the Star of Honolulu, the Majestic, or the Makani Catamaran, you can enhance your dinner cruise experience by considering the following suggestions: - View Reservations: When booking your cruise, consider reserving a window table for the best possible views of the scenic surroundings. - Special Occasions: Many dinner cruises offer special packages to celebrate occasions such as anniversaries, birthdays, or honeymoons. You may want to inquire about these options when making your reservation. - Photo Packages: Capture your memories professionally by choosing a photo package offered on board to ensure you have beautiful, professionally taken photographs to remember your experience. Why would you take a Sunset Dinner Cruise in Waikiki? Indulging in a Oahu sunset dinner cruise in Waikiki promises to be a memorable and enchanting experience. As the radiant sun slips below the horizon, you’ll find yourself enveloped in the breathtaking beauty of Hawaii’s natural landscape, interwoven with its vibrant and diverse cultural heritage. Here’s why this activity should be at the top of your to-do list: - Unparalleled Scenery: Feast your eyes on breathtaking panoramic views of Waikiki, Diamond Head, and the majestic expanse of the Pacific Ocean as you dine against this breathtaking backdrop. - Immersive Cultural Experience: Immerse yourself in the authentic traditions of Hawaii as you enjoy live entertainment, including captivating hula performances accompanied by soul-stirring traditional music. - Wildlife Encounters: As you journey on your cruise, be ready to witness awe-inspiring encounters with majestic humpback whales and diverse marine wildlife, elevating your experience with an extra layer of excitement. - Convenience: Experience the convenience of most cruise packages that include round-trip transportation from your hotel, ensuring a stress-free and enjoyable evening sailing on the beautiful waters of Waikiki. Get ready for an amazing adventure, making unforgettable memories as you enjoy the peaceful waters of O’ahu. Whether you opt for the opulent Star of Honolulu, the distinguished Majestic, or the laid-back elegance of the Makani Catamaran, you are guaranteed an evening of pure enchantment. Witness breathtaking sunsets, indulge in delectable cuisine, and bask in the warm embrace of tropical hospitality – it’s all part of the experience.
